newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egypt lowers most Dec crude prices 5-25 cents.
newsitem.headline: Egypt lowers most Dec crude prices 5-25 cents.

text.p: Egypt is lowering the December prices of its Gulf of Suez Blend by 25 cents and lowering four other grades of crude by between five and 25 cents against Dated Brent, an official from the state's Egyptian General Petroleum Corp (EGPC) said on Wednesday.
The price of one other grade was unchanged from November against Dated Brent, the official told Reuters.
Following are the new differentials for December against Dated Brent:
